title: "Attempting To Reconnect"
body:
About one in twenty games or so, I start up and about 5 minutes in, this starts. And it gets progressively worse and worse until I simply can't connect to server until the game ends. The entire time, my internet is working just fine and my ping never shows a change. It is about the only thing in this game that can actually tilt me, and it's a problem that I've concluded is not on my end.

During my last game, I could ping my job.  I could ping Yahoo, MSN, GMail, even your website, and we had an XBox One on Live that had no inturruption 10 feet away from me, but I couldn't connect to the game server.  Every time this happens, it turns into an automatic loss and no doubt gets me reported for leaving games, and it's not something I can fix because everything on my end continues to run normally.  The only conclusion I can draw is that one of your host servers is busted.

replies.body: You might have a weak or degrading connection that failing to keep you specifically communicating with the game server.  If there was a server issue, then most if not all players would be affected and something would be posted on the [service status](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) page.  It could be caused by an ISP issue, but usually something more local.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to rule out any local possibilities.  I hope that helps!
